title: Toolbox
description:
A red box for holding and transporting tools, such as a hammer and wrench. Generally depicted as latched shut with silver hardware and a black handle.

Commonly used for literal or metaphorical tools, toolkits, and building.

WhatsApp's design includes a hammer in front. Google’s design was previously shown as open with two wrenches and a pair of pliers.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's toolbox emoji is a meticulously detailed representation of a classic carry-all for tools, finished with a robust, metallic gray hue. The glossy surface and realistic lighting on Apple devices give it a tactile, three-dimensional quality, emphasizing its practicality and readiness for work. Its soft, rounded edges suggest durability and ease of use, symbolizing preparedness, DIY projects, or the act of fixing and building.
